Property Detail

ajaxSearchUsers

java.lang.Object ajaxSearchUsers
Executes a search of users, with users that are managed by the current user in a separate table.
Parameters:
ajaxSearchUsersTerm A - term to be searched on
Returns:
Table of results in HTML

managerCreateUser

java.lang.Object managerCreateUser
When a manager creates a user this is called to save it to database.
Parameters:
username - the email address of the user
firstName the - first name of the user
lastName the - last name of the user
email the - email of the user
avatarLocation the - location of the profile image
streetAddress1 the - address of the user
streetAddress2 the - address of the user
poBox users - PO box
dateOfBirth users - date of birth
city current - city user lives in
state current - state user lives in
zipcode users - zipcode
isManager if - user is manager or not
isAdmin - if user is an administrator
